PAGE_TITLE: FastComments - Live Commenting For Any Website or Application
HERO_DESCRIPTION: Pick a commenting system that will delight your users and developers. We'll provide the features you care about without spying on you.
SNIPPET_HEADING: Get Commenting Code For Your Site
SECTION_KEY_FEATURES_SUBTITLE: Discover the standout features that make our product unique: unparalleled performance, user-friendly design, robust security, and seamless integration tailored to your needs.
FEATURE_LIVE_CONVERSATIONS_DESC: Your community chats in real time on your website or application.
FEATURE_SCALABLE_DESC: Millions of pages or thousands of comments per page? It won't slow us down.
FEATURE_SSO_WEBHOOKS_DESC: Your community chats in real time on your website or application.
FEATURE_EFFICIENT_MODERATION_DESC: Moderate Quickly with Bulk Actions and Moderation Groups. Invite your moderators and get them to work.
FEATURE_MIGRATE_IN_MINUTES_DESC: Automated Migration from WordPress, Disqus, Commento, Muut Comments, IntenseDeba te, JustComments
FEATURE_FIGHT_SPAM_DESC: Get protected by a classifier that is continuously trained. Automatically remove unverified comments.
FEATURE_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Get fine grained, high level, scheduled, or immediate notifications.
FEATURE_CODE_MARKDOWN_DESC: Automatically detect, color, and format pasted code snippets.
FEATURE_ADAPTIVE_DESC: Adapts to your site - whether it has a light or a dark theme.
FEATURE_LOCALIZED_DESC: The client-side widgets and emails are fully localized in 14+ languages using browser locale detection.
FEATURE_CUSTOM_EMAIL_TEMPLATES_DESC: Emails sent to users can be customized and styled.
FEATURE_GO_INCOGNITO_DESC: Allow anonymous commenting, where an email is not required to comment.
FEATURE_INCREASE_ENGAGEMENT_DESC: FastComments decreases the time to comment, either with SSO integration or by providing a low-friction way to sign up.
FEATURE_MENTIONS_DESC: Tag users with our easy to use @mentions and they'll get notified right away.
FEATURE_HASHTAGS_DESC: Autocompleted hashtags, with the ability to pre-seed hashtags that point to external content.
FEATURE_GIFS_DESC: GIF picker with anonymized integrations with major providers.
FEATURE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_DESC: Your users stay up to date about new activity via subscriptions.
FEATURE_AWARDS_BADGES_DESC: Craft custom badges and reward your community.
FEATURE_USER_PROFILES_DESC: User Profiles complete with activity feeds and guestbook.
FEATURE_DIRECT_MESSAGING_DESC: Realtime messaging between users of your community.
FEATURE_RATINGS_REACTIONS_SURVEYS_DESC: Collect and report on reviews, reacts, and surveys.
FEATURE_ACCESS_CONTROL_DESC: Group users and limit access to comments.
FEATURE_NOTIFICATIONS_ALT_DESC: We help your community keep in touch with each other via reply, thread, and reaction notifications.
FEATURE_ANALYTICS_DESC: Built in analytics tools to monitor your site's traffic and activity at no extra cost.
FEATURE_FULL_TEXT_SEARCH_DESC: Moderators can search for comments by their text, or add search to any comment widget directly.
EXCELLENCE_BATTLE_TESTED_DESC: <%- Number(usageStats.pageLoadCount).toLocaleString() %> page loads in the last year.
SCALE_DETAILED_AUDITING_DESC: Fine-grained filterable audit log with API access.
SCALE_USER_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Manage users with fine-grained control over permissions.
SCALE_GDPR_COMPLIANCE_DESC: FastComments is GDPR compliant. See our Privacy Policy for how we manage user data.
SCALE_DEVELOPMENT_SUPPORT_DESC: You won't be left in the dark with direct development, integration, and setup support.
